pullRequest.title: Introduce SignedAggregateAndProof
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Add SignedAggregateAndProof and update the validator to create it instead of just AggregateAndProof.
Gossip is also done with SignedAggregateAndProof but the extra validation is not yet done. https://pegasys1.atlassian.net/browse/BC-357 will cover that validation.

commit.message: Introduce SignedAggregateAndProof and require it when submitting aggregations to the ValidatorApiChannel.
Add SSZ reference test for aggregateAndProof and fix it's hash tree root.
Add reference tests for SignedAggregateAndProof SSZ.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into signed-aggregate-and-proof
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into signed-aggregate-and-proof
Merge branch 'signed-aggregate-and-proof' of github.com:ajsutton/teku into signed-aggregate-and-proof
Rename tests to match proper style in other PR.
Don't run a validator as we don't want any blocks created.

nodes.bodyText: The only difference is that this pathToObject call was inlined so it only executes if it's not a .ssz file (which would fail and log a warning).

commit.message: Gossip SignedAggregateAndProof instead of just AggregateAndProof.

nodes.bodyText: If all thesesign<insertDataStructure>methods work on a Bytes object, do we really need multiple methods?
These tests are mostly congregated in DeserilizationTest file, although with all this keeping tests/constants central vs distributed issue, we're all over the place anyway...

commit.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into signed-aggregate-and-proof
